name: Moverrow
description:
Moverrow is a labyrinth game with 4 challanges and 4 key frames to find. It's for GameBoy emulator so you can play on any device if it has a Gameboy emulator.

And all of this thanks to GB Studio: GB Studio by Chris Maltby (itch.io)

UPDATES

-Moverrow 1.0-

· Moverrow's release

-Moverrow 1.0.5: Color and Music Update

· Darker colors  (green and blue)

· New music

· Moverrow Soundtrack on Soundcloud https://soundcloud.com/endersparky-64/sets/moverrow-soundtrack?utm_source=clipbo...

· Old Desert Cave difficulty increased

· Title screen
